name: passcheck
description: Password Security Tool - Check password strength and generate secure passwords

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf backend/node_modules backend/dist frontend/node_modules frontend/dist node_modules

author: Carter Fill <carterfill@example.com> (https://carterfill.dev)
